# This file is optional - for GitHub integration with Render
# Simply push to GitHub and Render will automatically deploy

# Deployment is triggered automatically when you push to your main branch
# No additional GitHub Actions setup is needed

# However, if you want automatic notifications, you can add webhooks:
# 1. Go to Render Dashboard
# 2. Select your service
# 3. Go to Settings â†’ Webhooks
# 4. Add your GitHub webhook URL

# For full automatic deployment, connect your GitHub repository to Render:
# 1. Sign in to Render: https://dashboard.render.com
# 2. Click "New +" and select your service type
# 3. Choose "GitHub" as the source
# 4. Select your repository
# 5. Render will automatically deploy on every push to main branch
